item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260106.4)
item.description:
What's New

fix: re-detect injection method when focused element role changes

Previously, the injection method cache only validated bundleId and

windowTitle. This caused issues when focus changed within the same app

via keyboard shortcuts (e.g., Cmd+T in Chrome to open new tab).

The problem:

  • User clicks on web content → AXWebArea → method: fast
  • User presses Cmd+T → focus moves to address bar (AXTextField)
  • Cache still valid (same bundleId, same windowTitle) → returns fast
  • But address bar needs selection method for autocomplete handling

Solution:

  • Added cachedRole to track focused element role
  • Cache validation now checks bundleId + windowTitle + role
  • When role changes (AXWebArea → AXTextField), cache invalidates
  • Re-detection returns correct method for new focus context
